data.title: Progranulin AAV gene therapy for frontotemporal dementia: translational studies and phase 1/2 trial interim results
meta_keywords: Intercellular Signaling Peptides and Proteins / cerebrospinal fluid
Intercellular Signaling Peptides and Proteins / genetics
data.meta_description: GRN mutations cause progranulin haploinsufficiency, which eventually leads to frontotemporal dementia (FTD-GRN). PR006 is an investigational gene therapy delivering the granulin gene (GRN) using an adeno-associated virus serotype 9 (AAV9) vector. In non-clinical studies, PR006 transduced neurons der …
